arts.ttl: Troy Parrott hat trick as Ireland reaches World Cup playoffs after stunning comeback against Hungary
arts.sum: He struck in the sixth minute of second-half stoppage time in Budapest to complete his hat trick in a 3-2 win that secured Ireland’s place in the playoffs for next year’s tournament in the United States, Canada and Mexico. Troy Parrott, the unheralded Ireland striker who sent Cristiano Ronaldo’s Portugal to a 2-0 loss on Thursday, did even better on Sunday with a hat trick.

arts.ttl: Republic of Ireland seal World Cup qualifying play-off with late winner vs Hungary
arts.sum: Troy Parrott dramatically completed his hat-trick by scoring a last-minute winner and securing Republic of Ireland a World Cup qualifying play-off spot following their thrilling 3-2 win against Hungary.

arts.ttl: Forget Parrott: Caoimhin Kelleher was Republic of Ireland's Hero vs Hungary
arts.sum: Caoimhin Kelleher was Republic of Ireland's true hero vs Hungary despite Troy Parrott's hat-trick

arts.ttl: Ireland seal World Cup qualifying play-off with late winner vs Hungary
arts.sum: Troy Parrott dramatically completed his hat-trick by scoring a last-minute winner and securing Republic of Ireland a World Cup qualifying play-off spot following their thrilling 3-2 win against Hungary.

arts.ttl: Liverpool: Arne Slot Will be Concerned by Milos Kerkez's Display vs Ireland
arts.sum: Liverpool: Arne Slot Will be Extremely Concerned by Milos Kerkez’s Display vs Ireland

arts.ttl: Parrott hat-trick sickens Hungary as Ireland grab World Cup playoff spot in wild win
arts.sum: An injury-time goal by Troy Parrott to complete his hat-trick booked Republic of Ireland a spot in the playoffs for next year’s World Cup with a thrilling 3-2 comeback victory over their nearest Group F rivals Hungary in a must-win game in Budapest. Higher-ranked Hungary just needed a draw to secure second place and led 2-1 at half-time thanks to goals from Daniel Lukacs and Barnabas Varga, but Parrott’s second goal of the night on 80 minutes and last-gasp winner broke the home side’s hearts. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Republic of Ireland stun Hungary to reach play-offs
arts.sum: Troy Parrott completes a hat-trick with virtually the last kick of the game as the Republic of Ireland come from behind to stun Hungary and reach the World Cup play-offs.

Hungary enter the final matchday with qualification firmly within reach. Sitting second in Group F on eight points, Marco Rossi’s side know that avoiding defeat guarantees at least a play-off place, w...

arts.ttl: Hungary vs Republic of Ireland predictions: Irish to come up just short in qualifying pursuit
arts.sum: The Republic of Ireland need to beat Hungary to keep their World Cup qualification hopes alive but Tom McGarry expects them to come up just short in Budapest.
